title: AWESOME font ID
content:
I know the sample isn't the best, but I'm looking for something close. Not sure if the distressed look is part of the typeface or added on to it. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161413im_/http:/typophile.com/files/awesome_4612.jpg)

Font: 

 Maiandra GD 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161413/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [awesome.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161413/http:/typophile.com/files/awesome.jpg) | 86.99 KB |
author: kvnrangel

comments.content: It looks like a manually compressed **[Maiandra (Demi Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317161413/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Galapagos%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Maiandra%20GD%20-%20Demi%20Bold&fid=cb094d288493696352c908c45ccdc83c&fsize=60&text=AWESOME&wrap=2)** by Galapagos Design Group [1994] + the distressed look effect
AWESOME! I think you are right on. Thanks!
